p: Table 1 presents the descriptive statistics of mean yearly summertime SUHI intensity and demographic makeup for all census tracts in the study from 2003 to 2018. The maximum SUHI intensity observed in any tract was 11.06 K, with a −13.63 K minimum. The mean SUHI intensity of all included tracts was 2.05 K. The mean percentage of White persons living in all tracts was 51.16%, with 17.87% Black, 21.99% Hispanic, and 8.10% Asian populations.
